actions.committee: Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to limit suspicious activity reporting requirements to requests from law enforcement agencies, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to require a financial institution to report a suspicious transaction relevant to a possible violation of law or regulation only upon request of an appropriate law enforcement agency.

titles.title: A bill to limit suspicious activity reporting requirements to requests from law enforcement agencies, and for other purposes.
